## EmojiExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EmojiExtensionOptions extends BaseExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultEmoji](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.defaultemoji.md) | <code>NamesAndAliases[]</code> | A list of the initial (frequently used) emoji displayed to the user. These are used when the query typed is less than two characters long. |
|  [maxResults](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.maxresults.md) | <code>number</code> | The maximum results to show when searching for matching emoji. |
|  [onSuggestionChange](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.onsuggestionchange.md) | <code>EmojiSuggestionChangeHandler</code> | Called whenever the suggestion value is updated. |
|  [onSuggestionExit](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.onsuggestionexit.md) | <code>EmojiSuggestionExitHandler</code> | Called when the suggestion exits. This is useful for cleaning up local state when emoji is set. |
|  [suggestionCharacter](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.suggestioncharacter.md) | <code>string</code> | The character which will trigger the emoji suggestions popup. |
|  [suggestionKeyBindings](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.suggestionkeybindings.md) | <code>EmojiSuggestionKeyBindings</code> | Key bindings for suggestions. |
